tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: doc Shashidhar V is a very good person and a very good doctor. he is a very  jolly and a very smart doctor who knows his profession in and out. he treated my mother's meniscus tear with keyhole surgery and by god's grace she is fine now. doctor gives accurate treatment to his patients and shanti research hospital is also a hygienic place with good facilities

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had an accident on 17th Aug'22 and it resulted in an posterior shoulder dislocation in right hand, before meeting Sir I had consulted couple of other Dr's and all of them without an doubt had suggested to undergo an surgery. Then I approached Practo surgeries and they suggested me to meet Sir, which I did and that has been a big turning point for me. He was so patient during consultation and asked me to explain the whole incident and also even checked about my past medical history, post listening to the same he explained about my condition in a lay man's language which helped me understanding the same better. Then he suggested me to undergo further 2 weeks of rest as it was my first episode of dislocation, which really helped and it saved me from an surgery. He suggested me to undergo 3 weeks of physiotherapy to regain the strength and movement of the hand, which I am currently doing. Out of my personal experience I had a great experience with Sir and can't thank him enough of for the support and guidance. I would without any doubt would suggest him to all my family and friends. God bless him for his kindness and caring mentality.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We have had great experience with Dr Shashidhar and I wish all the doctors work the same way as Dr Shashidhar. 

My mother underwent knee replacement  surgery and I must say Dr has been so supportive and caring for our family. He gives a lot of time to his patients and takes effort to explain the possibilities and outcome of each of the procedure. He makes sure that the patient and the family are happy and connects with them on a regular basis. I was not next to my mother when she underwent the surgery, but I did not have to worry because I knew my mother was taken care by the doctor and was in the best hands!  

I wish all the doctors work like him and give enough time and concern to each and every patient. I am not making any offensive statement here, but I have seen most of the doctors are here to make only MONEY! but Dr Shashidhar is definitely not one of those. He makes sure that the decision that is taken is only for the benefit of the patient without any personal motive. 
I can't thank him enough for all the good he has done to our family. We all owe him lot of respect and love!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had to undergo an ACL reconstruction surgery which was done by Dr. Shashidar. Below is my experience. 

Right from day one, I was explained about the problem in simple, understandable layman terms. 

I was given a local anaesthesia and Doctor was communicating with me even during the surgery. This helped keep up my spirits and stay calm during the surgery. 

I was given crystal clear instructions on do's and don'ts post surgery and also on physiotherapy. 

Doctor was personally following up with me on my progress and was answering all the questions I had. 

Overall, the surgery was successful and my leg is strong and stable today and I profusely thank Dr. Shashidhar for the same. 

Post my surgery, I have referred some friends when they had orthopaedic issues and all of them have come back with the same opinion. 

My relatives have also undergone knee replacement surgeries through Dr. Shashidhar and are doing great today. 

Calm, professional, friendly and approachable - these are what define him!

tags: None
review:
Excellent approach of the doctor towards my problem, explained everything, was very soft spoken, and very patient. 
Liked his treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.shashidhar us highly recommended, he explained me what was the issue with my bone dislocation and how it will be treated. He and his team operated me with utmost care and treated me very well. A very well experienced in this field and most patient doctor who listens to your problem and patiently answers them and make sures he clears it. I came out of the consultation room happily and thinking that if shashidhar is treating it then you will be fine and nothing to worry. 
Thanks for treating me so well and following up with me post surgery as well.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Sprain,Joint and Muscle Problems,Upper Back Pain,
review:
*** **** *********** ****** * **** *** **** **** *** gets down to root cause of the issue so aptly by probing you right questions and prescribes the appropriate medicine almost explaining every minute detail of how the issue could have been happened. He prescribes the right medicine and exercises appropriately. Its a heavenly blessing to find someone so good in knowledge and educating the patient so very well without losing patience. I have visited him multiple times, for different muscular issues  with myself and family too. He has always been very friendly and has treated me extremely well.
Thank you doctor. You are just amazing !

tags: Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: We had a confirmed appointment at Apollo Clinic Electronic city bangalore. When we visited the clinic we noticed that the frontdesk folks were not organized and to my bad when we reached out to them with appointment details,  they simply said the doctor is unavailable and no other orthopedic was available in clinic. Had taken my aged in law and had a bad experience and loose of our time, effort and pain the aged person had taken to reach the clinic. Not sure how they can be such care less when the appointment was confirmed a day before.  Whole incident was just reassuring that the clinic was not focused on treating their patients.
reply_text: When an emergency surgery comes up sometimes it will be difficult for anyone to coordinate. Sometimes such things happen as surgeons we have to address the emergency operations first. As I know your appointment was rescheduled for evening as first patient and I was on time in evening waiting for you to turn up but you didn‚Äôt turn up. So blaming someone for doing his job sincerely is unfair. I can understand you had some difficulties in getting the patient but nobody does it intentionally. Hope you understand that doctors are also human beings and not gods.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am truly blessed to have met Dr.Shashidhar.V. I was unable to lift my left hand and do any activity from past one year and it was associated with small joints pain and numbness. I had visited 4 orthopedicians and neurologists and I was always misguided that it was my cervical issue but he was the one to find out that I had rheumatoid arthritis and it had already affected my shoulder joint. Even the knee and hip joint were associated but with his treatment for rheumatoid arthritis, my knee and hip joint recovered. For shoulder joint he performed a successful arthoscopy, without which I would have lost my left hand mobility completely. The level of patience and time he gives for case study is commendable. His friendliness and smile makes the patient feel that there is nothing major and boosts the self confidence. I thank him from the bottom of my heart.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** **** *********** * **** **** It was first time in my life of 44 years, I met 3-4 Orthopaedics after falling from bike. As earlier doctors were not able to diagnose it properly, I was lucky to meet Dr. Shashidhar V. He was quick enough by looking at my hand to get MRI scan done. Report indicated that there is a GT fracture. The way doctor spoke to me and explained it, it was amazing and gave me extreme confidence as I had no fracture in my life before.  He is very polite, honest and down to earth. He answers every questions and easily approachable. He responds to queries finding time in his busy schedule too. It is amazing.

Thank you doctor for treating my GT fracture. Now I am back to normal with regular strengthening exercises as you suggested. Thanks a lot.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My father had a recurrent shoulder dislocation problem. He had a shoulder dislocation at around 10 PM and all the clinics were closed. When we called up the clinic the doctor waited for us and helped us. Then the doctor suggested a surgery as the dislocation had occurred multiple times. The doctor explained the details of the problem, the surgery process to me and my parents. The doctor has a lot of patience and answered all the questions. The surgery went well and my dad is recovering fast. Thanks to the able guidance of the doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Shashidhar is excellent interms of providing accurate time for appointments (We never waited during our 15 visits so far).
His approach to my father's knee problem really helped us in getting rid of the problem. He replaced both my father's knees during last year. He professionally handled the surgeries to our complete satisfaction. His handling of post surgery really gave confidence to our family. Now, my father walks like 50 year old though his actual age is 86 years.
 His down to earth attitude helped us in getting the lab tests done and results known very early.

Post this surgery, I recommended him for many within our family and they are also completely satisfied with his professional treatment.

A big thanks to you Shashidhar for your help in knee replacement for my father.  You deserve a very big applause for your professional handling of the situation. 

I very strongly recommend Dr. Shashidhar for any consultation and surgery.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Very friendly and caring doctor with accurate diagonosis.

I was suffering with back pain a lot and visited Dr. Shashidhar V. He is very friendly and caring. After the diagonosis, he prescribed physiotherapy and some drugs. 

After 3 sittings if physiotherapy, back pain vanished. 

I was thinking that this is going to be a big problem with more sufferings and frequent visits to hospital. Right after the diagonosis and prescriptions, most importantly after speaking to the doctor, my inhibitions got answered.  I really thank  doctor for this.

Overall, Dr Shashidhar is a great person to talk to and get the medical clarifications (He spends time speaking and answering all doubts) and makes it easy to go through the treatment.

Thanks again Doctor.
Vaidyo Narayano Harihi!!

review:
Visited Dr.Shahshidhar multiple issues for self. Ankle sprain, shoulder SLAP tear and thumb injury caused by volleyball. 
We were late for the appointment but the doctor waited. He listens to the problem very patiently and explains the issue even more patiently and in layman terms. He is open to queries and answers them to satisfaction. 
My mother has knee pain and he did the tests to satisfaction and suggested care accordingly. 

I recommend him for any Ortho care.
